label: Area
comment: A named, delimited and identified part of a land and or water surface of the globe subject to dedicated uniform agricultural treatment.

datatypeProperties.comment: The designated section, expressed as text, of this agricultural zone area.
The code specifying the multi-surface type for this agricultural zone area.
An alternate identifier issued by a third party for this laboratory observation party.

objectProperties.comment: An agricultural characteristic applicable to this agricultural zone area.
Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
Crop produce harvested from this agricultural zone area.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A crop plot specified for this agricultural application.
An agricultural zone area subordinate to this agricultural zone area.

referencedBy.comment: A specified agricultural application applied to this agricultural zone area.
An agricultural zone area specified for this crop plot.
An agricultural zone area subordinate to this agricultural zone area.
